titles: Obseruations in the art of English poesie. By Thomas Campion. Wherein it is demonstratiuely prooued, and by example confirmed, that the English toong will receiue eight seuerall kinds of numbers, proper to it selfe, which are all in this booke set forth, and were neuer before this time by any man attempted
author: Campion, Thomas, 1567-1620.
publisher: By Richard Field for Andrew Wise,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: English language --  Versification --  Early works to 1800.
English language --  Rhyme --  Early works to 1800.
